name: Forte de Santa Luzia
title: () Forte de Santa Luzia
description: Free public flat P at fortress inlet (also military museum) with wide view to Elvas town historic center and walls. Adequate walking distance to supermarket (Lidl) and town center. Nice panorama over town at sunset. Also by night.

title: (7350-145) Elvas - 5 rua da adjuda
description: Clay, flat, discreet and 2 steps from the center.

title: (7350) Elvas - 954 Rua Maria Martins
description: Rather for vans and vans

title: (7350-075) Elvas - 5 Avenida de São Domingos
description: Public parking, free off season. ATTENTION accessible only to vans up to 6 m: the city gates are narrow and some in chicane! magnificent view of the plain. Access to the main square in 5 minutes walk.

title: () Elvas - 29 Avenida da Boa Fé
description: Parking near the playground. At the foot of the walled city. Fountain.

title: (7350) Elvas - Avenida de Badajoz
description: Free gravel a little unleveled P with poor shadows, about 500m from historic military town. Toilets 150m NE on way to town.

title: (7350-175) Elvas - 4A Rua do Mestre Escola
description: Quiet place. nice for one night. walk in the city center on foot. very nice point of view. very friendly locals. place to respect and not to pollute thank you. Nice restaurant to try with local specialties, "taverna portal do tempo".

title: (7350-158) Elvas - 12 Rua de Domingos C Lavadinho
title_short: (7350-158) Elvas - 12 Rua de Domingos C Lavadinho
description: Park near Aldi supermarket. We had a peaceful night.

title: (7350) Elvas - N246
description: Mixed parking! Spacious place nearly flat with easy access, aside great aqueduct, 15 min walking from downtown. Place recommended by the police. Few shadows, some noise from two nearby roads more evident after 07:30.

title: (7350) Elvas - N246
description: New parking on the access road to Forta de Graça. There is one at the beginning of the road and others at the top. We are in the middle. flat, beautiful view of the aqueduct.

title: (7350) Elvas -
description: Small spot in the forest not far from elvas, very pretty. Accessible but stony path. Ideal for this rest. We didn't spend the night. Unfortunately place a bit dirty….

title: (7350) Elvas - N4
description: On the Intermarché car park, free services. free washing machines, outside the shop

name: Estrada do Forte da Graça
title: (7350) Estrada do Forte da Graça
description: Well flat parking with extended panorama over Elvas fortress and city; not illuminated. On middle of climbing road to Fort Graça, where on top there is P too small and sloping on big cobblestone’s.

title: (7350) Elvas - N4
description: Parking next to the Elvas Coliseum. Quiet for the night and level. Some noise from the road passing by

title: (7350) Elvas - Unnamed Road
description:
Quiet and beautiful place next to the old church ruins and olive groves. A few options of where to park, flat and shade under the eucalyptus tree.

Much more secluded, clean and private than the other parking places by the fort, but same distance to aqueduct and town.

Track is passable in any size vehicle, a bit rough but very doable for anyone who isn't too precious about their vehicle.

Very peaceful at night, occasionally people visit in the day.

title: (7350-466) Elvas - Unnamed Road
description: Cemetery parking, calm, flat and tarmac

title: (06006) Badajoz - 9 Diseminado Benavides
description: At the end of the path to the previous spot to be even quieter, it is a nice flat place with pick nick tables from the sun and the shade and on the other side of the river is Portugal :) Accessible to all. Ps. I did not take a photo because I went there by bike.

title: (7350) Elvas - Unnamed Road
description: Ample parking day and night, without any service, near a very cheap snack bar.

title: (7350) Senhora da Ajuda -
description: In the middle of nature, esplanade where the Chapel of Nuestra Señora de la Ayuda is located, with views of the Guadiana river and the Ayuda Bridge. Perfect to stop to eat or rest, and enjoy the views.

name: Olivença, Estrada da Ponte da Ajuda
title: (06100) Olivença, Estrada da Ponte da Ajuda
title_short: (06100) Olivença, Estrada da Ponte da Ajuda
description: The location marks the entrance to an area on the banks of the Guadiana, a space where you can overnight without problem. NOTE: location on map is inside private farm! The surroundings are beautiful, cows graze and horses roam freely. There is no water, nor any type of service except trash containers. As ALTERNATIVE, turn to chapel “Capela da Ajuda”, on soft hill about 150m away main road, where you find flat parking area without shadows but illuminated, with panorama over old damaged bridge and Guadiana river.

title: (06006) Badajoz - 4 Cuesta Albalá
description: Behind the aquatico.Esplanade park where it is possible to spend the night and very quiet area near the mall.the weekend something more crowded. Maybe in the summer season it is not possible.

title: (06006) Badajoz - Unnamed Road
description: Good place sleep through the night... Free parking next to comercial areas and center of the city Badajoz.

title: (06006) Badajoz - S/N Avenida de Elvas
description: Ample parking space for shopping at the mall, with free water and electricity pole, WiFi in the mall, only one space and there is no gray area to empty.

title: (06006) Badajoz -
description: A quiet place next to the river. In wild nature. Only some fishermen pass. Ideal to come with dogs. Different types of birds are sighted. Following the path there are more spots to spend the night. Please keep the space clean.

title: (06011) Badajoz - Camino de Badajoz a Olivenza O de Malos Caminos
title_short: (06011) Badajoz - Camino de Badajoz a Olivenza O de Malos Caminos
description: Sur le bord de la rivière. plein de oiseaux. tres calme

address.street: Camino de Badajoz a Olivenza O de Malos Caminos

title: (06006) Badajoz - PK 405 Autovía del Suroeste
description: Special galp area for showering, you have around 8 minutes. Water with good pressure and hot. Highly recommended.

title: (06009) Badajoz - s/n Calle Ángel Galván
description: Two small car parks by the river. Only fishermen come. Otherwise a very quiet area next to the canoeing school and with exceptional views.

title: (06006) Badajoz - Paseo Fluvial
description: Surface-hardened sand and stones. On the river. At the Badajoz rowing club. Saturday night noisy from nightclub nearby. ATTENTION: A wide, well-developed asphalt road leads here directly by the river, which strangely enough is not recommended by any navigation system. It is advisable to look for the access road directly at the bridge itself. Otherwise you will be piloted wildly through the area on adventurous paths, and in the end you will not arrive.

title: (06006) - 31 Urbanizacion Sub
description: A flat place and quite far from the noise of bottles and restaurants on the weekends. There is plenty of room, with very wide squares, and it is quiet. No services, but we found it to be a pretty decent place to rest since the AC area was full and there was a lot of noise in that area.

title: (06100) Olivenza - Unnamed Road
description: Bordering the river on the Spain Portugal border on the road from Olivenze to Elvas. Before the bridge take the pier on the left and look for the place that suits you best. Of course leave it clean when you leave.

title: (06011) Badajoz - Calle José Miguel Sánchez
description: Sports Las Granadillas. Open every day until 10:45. Showers with hot water. Cloakroom on entering right.

title: (06107) Vila Real - Unnamed Road
description:
We came here by chance. We loved it, the road is quite bumpy but it is worth it. Room for vans or cars.
Great views.

title: (06006) Badajoz - 414P Camino Nevero
description: Area to rest, quiet area, there is a gas station nearby and a Mercadona nearby, an area of trees, a grassy area nearby to walk the dog

title: (06011) Badajoz - 8 Calle Emigrante Pacense
description: Large parking lot near the bridge

title: (06011) Badajoz - Km. 2,8 Carretera Olivenza
description: Amalio Gamma - they have butane and propane gas bottles from CEPSA.

title: (06011) Badajoz - 12 Avenida Jose María Alcaraz y Alenda
title_short: (06011) Badajoz - 12 Avenida Jose María Alcaraz y Alenda
description: Self-service washing shop.

address.street: 12 Avenida Jose María Alcaraz y Alenda

title: (06006) Badajoz - Parcela 17 Avenida Joaquín Sánchez Valverde
title_short: (06006) Badajoz - Parcela 17 Avenida Joaquín Sánchez Valverde
description: The cheapest gas station in Badajoz. Friendly staff.

title: (7350) Elvas - N243
description: Good place to spend a quiet weekend.

title: (06006) Badajoz - 18 Avenida Carolina Coronado
description: Laundrette

title: (06010) Badajoz - 2E Urbanizacion Sup
description: Dirt parking where you can leave the AC without problem, besides there is a dog park next to it.

title: (06006) Badajoz - 11 Camino Moreras
description: Large paved parking lot in residential area under construction. Next to the old bridge with direct footpath access to the center of Badajoz. Excellent spot to visit this city. Muito Perto gives area for motorhomes where it is possible to unload and supply water.

title: (7350) - N243
description: Nice place, does not have any service, but the views are very good. You have to arrive by day, since it is difficult to enter the area with AC. A little dirty

title: (06007) Badajoz - 10 Camino Viejo San Vicente
description:
Recently renovated, for 20 seats
improved with electricity, without leveling and without shadows, on the right bank of the Guadiana river and right next to the Las Palmas bridge (currently only for cyclist pedestrians); garden to one side too. Very nice night view of the bridge. Within walking distance of other banks of the river and therefore the city center. It is usually busy; look for P identified here as an alternative (on the same bank after the bridge).
The maximum parking will be 72/96 hours. It is forbidden to remove any element from the motorhome such as chairs, tables, barbecues, awnings, clothes lines, etc..., since this is considered "camping" and the laws of the Junta de Extremadura expressly prohibit free camping. The area must be kept in a perfect state of cleanliness. When using the filling and emptying terminal, do not spill liquids out of the sink and grid, leaving everything clean. It is forbidden to wash cars or motorhomes in the area Failure to comply with these rules will be penalized.

name: Barragem do Caia
title: (7370) Barragem do Caia
description: Parking in land, flat, overlooking the lake and pontoon for fishing or swimming. Good for a night without noise. No service

title: (7350) Barragem do Caia -
description: Cool to sleep on an islands

title: (06004) Badajoz - 11a Calle Rafael Lucenqui
description: City-centric laundry with loading and unloading parking directly across the street and nearby English court for shopping

title: () Vila Fernando - N 243-1 - 1 km N Vila Fernando
title_short: () Vila Fernando - N 243-1 - 1 km N Vila Fernando
description: Beautiful area around small dam about 150m E of road. Calm and pleasant; some shadows. Easy flat gravel access that has bifurcation (maybe better bottom of right). Unplanned early morning visit of sheep which put a smile on our faces. Swimming possible.

title: (7350) Elvas - N243
description: Wonderful place not far from the road but enough not to hear noises in the night, it is very windy!

title: (7350) Elvas - N 243 - 1km E Caia dam wall
title_short: (7350) Elvas - N 243 - 1km E Caia dam wall
description: Semi-abandoned service area, nowadays useful ONLY to drain wastewater (grey water). It is 100m away N 243 road and just outside of closed camping site.

title: (7350) Elvas - Unnamed Road
description: Ideal place to spend the night. You can get there by camper van if it hasn't rained a lot. We spent 2 nights very well...

title: (06007) Badajoz - 36 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Level parking lot, as an alternative if the official motorhome parking space is full, without V / E, without electricity, driveway a bit steep, nice, helpful residents

title: (7350) Vila Fernando - 21 Largo da Independência
description: Fountain with two fresh water threaded taps (7m away from street border) inside typical flat village, aside church and “Taberna do Adro” typical small restaurant. To rest a little, use square in front of church (busy on meals time).

title: (06010) Badajoz - 2 Calle de la Violeta
description: Dead end street to spend a quiet night. Only people walking in the morning with their dog.

title: (06002) Badajoz - 10-14 Calle Campillo
description: A very well conditioned place to enjoy an enviable environment, nature, animals the Guadiana with sports and leisure facilities. bar next to the area to be able to have breakfast, lunch and dinner with products from Extremadura. very well located, without the need to have alternative vehicles. the very welcoming people and showing that we are very welcome in a city with so much to enjoy

name: Parque de merendas de Juromenha
title: (7250) Parque de merendas de Juromenha
description: Small picnic area (3 tables+seats) with few shadows (useful for summertime), at crossing of N 373 = R 373 to Juromenha.

title: (06008) Badajoz - 1 Calle Paz
description: Parking lot, very quiet for one night

title: (7250) Juromenha - Rua da Escola
description: Extended flat free P with some lightning, at beginning of Juromenha historic military village (read info on other registered place). Nearer free motorhome service = Terrugem (18 km). By the moment (2023-Feb) it is partially used by cranes of high speed train line construction. NOTES: A) in summertime, stop here and walk across village to check if space enough to run, specially if you think to go till the other registered place; B) vehicles longer 7,5m: better park here.

name: Villarreal de Olivenza, Embarcadero y mirador celeste
title: (06107) Villarreal de Olivenza, Embarcadero y mirador celeste
title_short: (06107) Villarreal de Olivenza, Embarcadero y mirador celeste
description: Flat free P in left Guadiana riverside, here big Alqueva dam/lake, aside small leisure crafts harbor (= “embarcadero”). Lawn picnic area, swings and a restaurant bar. Beautiful views of Alqueva lake, Juromenha old fortress on opposite riverside (Portugal). Very curious astronomical viewpoint (= mirador celeste”) that is flat white disc 2m wide between picnic tables and water, that has stars map that is activated 22:00…24:00 in Spring and Summer. Unsupervised bathing area.

title: (06008) Badajoz - 98 Avenida Ricardo Carapeto Zambrano
description: Laundry

name: Cemitério
title: () Cemitério
description: P on a hill over large Guadiana river, here Alqueva dam (mirror surface) with old Juromenha border castle at left and panorama over Spanish plane in front. Village around walls is small but friendly with interesting bar and one restaurant. Access road is narrow but at bottom there is good space. Close to cemetery and unleveled besides beginning and two or three even on top. To visit fortress and village, you can move 400m back to wider area before village and second picnic. Nice place to watch sunset, stars (very few lightning around), sunrise. Public toilets are just after 2nd picnic when coming back. Hiking trail is PR 5 ADL.

address.street: Rua do Miradouro de S. Lázaro

title: (06008) Badajoz - 8 Calle Hermanos Vidarte
description: Free parking day and night nearby playground for children. Lidl 2 minutes drive.

title: (7350) Terrugem - 37 Rua Mandriana
description:
Quiet parking, located in front of a public park. Both public toilets, picnic area and barbecue and a petit bar. A soroll mica from the road. Nit no problemas.
------
Quiet parking in front of a park. With public toilet, picnic area and barbecue, also with a small bar. The road can be heard a little. Trouble free night.

At the entrance to the park it is indicated that camping is prohibited.

title: (06007) Badajoz - Unnamed Road
description: Natural area, next to the Guadiana river, ideal for fishing. Easy access, dirt lane. Camping prohibited.

title: (06180) Badajoz -
description: Place away from the road, very good to spend the night, spend the day and take a swim (although sometimes the area is a bit dirty because of the people who go and do not pick up what they dirty). We left the car next to the stone bridge. To get to the site you have to walk a little (5-10min, depending on what you want to go into). Very calm place where at night the stars are incredible. We had a perfect night and in the morning we were greeted by a very nice man who was walking by.

title: (06010) Dehesilla de Calamón - 15 Dehesilla Calamón
description: Park a couple of km from Badajoz, ideal to rest, very quiet area with a shop next door. The parking area has good shade. Inside the park there is a feeding area and exercise machines.

title: (7350) Terrugem - 18 Largo Joaquim Cordeiro Vinagre
description: Fairly large Parking on very near outskirts of village with artisanal service spot (cassette drain = grid with green rope). Choice of sun or shadow shade and sun. Quiet place, on the outskirts. Friendly and correct restaurants and cafe and traditional shopping in the village (see introduction of adjacent Parking). NOTE: market day on Wednesday and Saturday. Park along the field side.

title: (7350) Terrugem - 7350 Largo Joaquim Cordeiro Vinagre
description: Quiet, large car park on the outskirts of the village. Easily accessible, also suitable for large motorhomes.

title: (06009) Badajoz - Km 2. 1 Carretera de Sevilla
description:
Motorhome rest area located in a gas station 2 kilometers from Badajoz, leveled and fenced for the safety of children and pets
It has 20 seats, a store at the gas station where they have bread, coffee (mini super) with special discounts for caravans. It also has special discounts on fuel for caravanists.
It has a picnic area where you can use chairs, tables, awnings etc ...
The maximum parking is 72/96 hours, the area for filling and emptying sewage is far from the camping area, just behind the store.
It also has gray water emptying in the grid of the open laundry box
It has a laundry room for caravans with promotions and discounts.
It has a sale of candies.

title: (7370-035) Campo Maior - Avenida Bombeiros Voluntários
description: Long free flat P parallel to avenue, between stadium and firemen station. Quiet enough by night to rest. No facilites.

name: Camping Rural Os Anjos
title: (7370-214) Camping Rural Os Anjos
description: Small Campsite just outside lovely Campo Maior (1,5 km E) with its supermarkets, restaurants and museums. It is 14 km from the Spanish border Badajoz and 20 km from Elvas. It has a beautiful view. You can do walking and cycling or visit nice towns. Nice atmosphere.

title: (06008) Badajoz - 52 Carretera Madrid
description: Good price fuel, LPG and motorhome washing service station

name: Camping Puro Alentejo
title: (7350) Camping Puro Alentejo
description: Located in the heart of Alto Alentejo, 3+0,3 km from the historic village of Barbacena and less than 20 min from the city of Elvas (classified as World Heritage by UNESCO), this rural camping is prepared to welcome motorhomes, caravans, tents and all those who seek the simplicity of the countryside and, above all, experiences to share in the moment and remember later.

title: (06100) Olivenza - 9A Carretera Badajoz
description: Large parking at the entrance of Olivenza road from Badajoz to Olivenza 10 minutes from the city without services

title: (06009) Badajoz - 3 Urbanizacion Tres Arroy ST-2
description: Very nice and wide-ranging picnic area. Also suitable for overnight stays. If you don't want to spend the night directly on the adjacent road, you can take the paved path and drive further into the park. On weekends, many families come to have a barbecue during the day. It's quieter during the week. We spent 2 nights here with no problems

title: (06100) Olivenza - 1 Camino del Polvorín
description: It is a very large field, but it appears as a parking lot, at the back of the Mercadona Supermarket. It is no wonder, but it is definitely the only quiet place in all of Olivenza. The one in the center, in addition to being in a roundabout, the pavement of the streets is cobbled, it increases the noise notably. It is at 840m from the center. There is no other.

title: (06100) Olivenza - 3 Calle Juan Manuel Robles Ramallo
title_short: (06100) Olivenza - 3 Calle Juan Manuel Robles Ramallo
description: Just outside, absolute tranquility

title: (06100) Olivenza - 20 Paseo Hernando de Soto
description: Large flat parking, where you can park during the day to visit the city. Partially occupied Saturday morning with open market.

title: (06100) Olivenza - 87 Calle Francia
description: New municipal motorhome area, with capacity for 10, parallel to BA-103 secondary road, flat and illuminated. Service with good access: gray and black waters, drinking water. About 700m flat way till historic center.

title: (7150) Borba - N4
description: Nice pic pic area. With a lake of trees, an abandoned building. Possibility to sleep on the spot. Dirty place, a lot of rubbish, but peaceful.

title: (7340) - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful surroundings, nice fishing spots both upstream and down the river, lots of shade spots.

title: (06100) Olivenza - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet little corner by the lake, tables and garbage cans available. I spent a day and a night here, no worries.

title: (06193) Bótoa -
description: A quiet area with trees that provide shade, to stop along the way, rest, nap, and continue on your way, very quiet and spacious

title: (7160) Vila Viçosa - 2 Rua da Cruz
description: Large parking lot, very quiet for sleeping, just attached to the castle wall. No service or prohibition. To visit the marble quarries, association down the street. Public toilet near 8 rua de Estremoz within the castle grounds.

title: (7370) Campo Maior - 3 Rua do Bairro de São Pedro
title_short: (7370) Campo Maior - 3 Rua do Bairro de São Pedro
description: Magnificent place to visit the castle…and spend the night…very quiet

address.street: 3 Rua do Bairro de São Pedro

title: (7160-214) Vila Viçosa - 56 Rua Dom João Iv
title_short: (7160-214) Vila Viçosa - 56 Rua Dom João Iv
description: Very calm night, to visit the Palace of the Dukes of Braganza

title: (7150) Borba - 5 Avenida Dom Dinis de Melo e Castro
title_short: (7150) Borba - 5 Avenida Dom Dinis de Melo e Castro
description: Next to the Fonte das Bicas. Next to the park and next to the center. Level squares

address.street: 5 Avenida Dom Dinis de Melo e Castro

title: (7160-363) Vila Viçosa - EM 533, Pardais
description: Newly opened motorhome area, large level spaces, all services free. A fantastic option to spend the night after visiting towns like Vila Viçosa 4 km away. Very quiet at night. Now an ASA paying site.

title: (7340) Arronches -
description: Place near the town, an alternative to the motorhome area since it was full when we arrived.

title: (7250-139) Alandroal - Alandroal Volunteer Firefighters Street
description: Parking lots along sidewalks, flat and illuminated, at rear of firemen installation. Easy access from N 373 = R 373 road. Somewhat near city center.

title: (7250) Alandroal - 32 Rua de Nossa Senhora da Conceição
title_short: (7250) Alandroal - 32 Rua de Nossa Senhora da Conceição
description: Free public flat P at rear of market building, very near historic center, tourist office and traditional shopping of this small town. Open swimming pool is not far away. Without shadows, illuminated and quiet by night (few traffic on streets). NOTE: not available Wednesday morning (7…13 h). All 8 painted places are 8m long.

address.street: 32 Rua de Nossa Senhora da Conceição

title: () - Unnamed Road
description: Near Arronches, set back from the roads, a small space surrounded by olive trees and sheep. Quiet. For small transport type combi.

title: (7250) Alandroal - 2 Travessa do Silveira
description: Public free P with flat long painted places on top, near stadium. Illuminated, very quiet out of football events, with view to castle and surroundings. Good alternative to P aside market if complete.

title: (7250) Alandroal - 9 Lugar da Cruz do Martelo
title_short: (7250) Alandroal - 9 Lugar da Cruz do Martelo
description: Fairly new motorhome area with 16 straight pitches with electricity, sewage and fresh water. Complete service point on top. Inlet only via online via website “Outdoor Routes” as explain on panel (it takes a while, but works; if not, call help number there). 500m climbing till historic center.

title: (06140) Talavera la Real - 3 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Flat and asphalted parking belonging to the service area of the Shell gas station. There is room for trucks. Shadow

title: (7340-002) Arronches - Rua A
description: Free public flat P aside Centro Cultural de Arronches and police (GNR) with reasonable pedestrian access to historic center and local shopping; quiet enough to overnight and illuminated.

title: (7340) Arronches - 22 Bairro do Telheiro
description: 5-space car park on the outskirts of the village which looks rather calm, with a nice setting on a beautiful large river, tables a little set back for a quiet meal, drinking water €2

title: (7340) Arronches - Largo da Restauração
description: Free flat parking on wide L-shape street back castle tower and toy museum. Easy walking access to historic center, tourist office, restaurants and traditional shopping. May be busy on working hours.

name: Ponte do Crato
title: (7340) Ponte do Crato
description: 5 double tables with seats and grill, without shadows, just left Caia riverside; P on SE of Crato bridge. It is 250m away from free motorhome area (read its introduction to learn more).

title: (7450) - IP2
description: Picnic area, well signposted, a few tables, garbage cans and not much more. Plenty of room to park, any size. Good for a quick stop or a night's sleep. A bit of traffic after 6am due to the road. Good place for a few hours sleep near the road.

name: Camping and Caravaning Park Lapa dos Gaivões
title: (7340-111) Camping and Caravaning Park Lapa dos Gaivões
title_short: (7340-111) Camping and Caravaning Park Lapa dos Gaivões
description: Camping and Caravanning Park Lapa dos Gaivões Hortas de Baixo cx  Esperança Arronches Opening period: From April 1 to September 30: 7 a.m. to 11 p.m. From October 1 to March 31: 8 a.m. to 10 p.m. The campsite is part of the natural park of the Serra de S. Mamede. Walk along the various approved trails, ride a bicycle, visit the rich historical or natural heritage, bathe in a swimming pool or river beach, go canoeing, observe birds, delight in Alentejo cuisine, or simply resting, are some of the activities to which the visitor can dedicate himself and in which he can have fun. The large spaces to settle, an open leisure space next to a small line of water that originates in the park and forms a natural swimming pool, offer the visitor an environment of peace, calm and tranquility. 15% discount on stays of more than 6 nights excluding electricity; 25% discount on stays of more than 15 nights excluding electricity.Special discounts for extended stays from October 1 to May 31:One week:-20%;15 days:-30%;1 month:-40%;2 months:- 50%.

title: (7100-684) Veiros - 17 Largo 25 de Abril
description: Flat renewed square (now without shadows) good to visit village (typical houses bordered with traditional colors; church on top of hill) or take a meal or coffee.

title: (7450-114) Monforte - 15 Rua Augusto Amorim Afonso
description: A place where you can park your camper to enter the village.

title: (06140) Talavera la Real - 1 Carretera Albuera
description:
Place attached to the road.
Ample to park.

title: (7100-695) Veiros - 3 N372
description: Scale new to weight motorhomes and trucks, at border of N 372 road (km 41), with payment by coins or card. On top of soft hill with panorama, adequate for a short break. Diesel station 100m away.

title: (06170) La Albuera - 11 Calle Francisco Álvarez Gómez
title_short: (06170) La Albuera - 11 Calle Francisco Álvarez Gómez
description: Free service area with parking on the street. Famous for his battle against Napoleonic troops on 16/5/1811

title: (06170) La Albuera - Calle Avenida de Extremadura
title_short: (06170) La Albuera - Calle Avenida de Extremadura
description:
Nice picnic area with lots of tables under trees. Trash cans available. start of a little walk by the river under the bridge.
Parking is along a narrow road so not suitable for very wide motorhomes.

name: Camping Rosario(16+)
title: () Camping Rosario(16+)
description: Adults only (16+) Good small-scale campsite. Calm. Very clean. Pets allowed. Community barbecue and refrigerator. Swimming pool. Living room and library. It does not have a store. Very few seats for lunch and dinner. Payment in cash.

title: (06193) Cuartel de Menacho Bótoa - Unnamed Road
title_short: (06193) Cuartel de Menacho Bótoa - Unnamed Road
description: Old arm of the road which serves as a rest area. Slightly away from the road.

title: (06170) La Albuera - 5 Carretera Badajoz Granada
description: Ample shaded parking in front of the municipal swimming pool, perfect for a night and tranquility despite the road.

title: (7250-065) Alandroal - Barragem lucefecit
description: Parking at dam

title: (06510) Alburquerque - EX-110
description: Just off the main road.  You can get about 30 m from the road.  Great for lunch or an overnight stop.

title: (7250-065) Terena - Senhora da Boa Nova
description: Spot at the Sanctuary of Nossa Senhora da Boa Nova. after the sanctuary downhill, left side, very good level ground. Very little rural traffic. Near the charming town of Terena.

title: (7450) - IP2
description: Well-spaced lot quite far out in the country, situated next to the through road IP2. At night, there seems to be not too much traffic. It has the shape of a small roundabout, but there's no passing traffic. Just slightly sloping. There are some picnic tables and benches installed out here. Not a site of outstanding beauty, but quite alright for passing a night.

name: Parque de Autocaravanas
title: (7250) Parque de Autocaravanas
description: RV park with 2 flat pitches and all services. Access only through the website which is not easy unless you are pre-registered (try calling).

title: (7100) Estremoz - IP2
description: Laundry self-service, with bathrooms, free Wi-Fi inside supermarket and bakery.

title: (7100-500) Estremoz - Unnamed Road
description: Parking next to Cafeteria A Estaçao, it is a car park where it is possible to park and spend the night. 15 minutes from Rossio Marques de Pombal.

title: (7100-147) Estremoz -
description: Service area in the Intermarché.

title: (7100) Estremoz -
description:
Small gravel parking lot surrounded by a nature. Some cars passing by during the day, mostly locals picking up water from the water source which next to this place. Very quiet at night time.

It's a bit unlevel so better to have levellers blocks.

title: (06105) Cheles - Unnamed Road
description: Caravan and motorhome private parking area on left Guadiana riverside (here Alqueva big dam/lake) on La Dehesa / Cheles beach, 4,5 km from Cheles village and EX-315 road. Bathing area, toilets, outdoor shower, beach bar. Ideal to cool down, at night in summer the temperature lowers and you sleep nicely. NOTES: there are two grid gates (to prevent animals moving) usually closed that you can open and close to cross; it is FORBIDDEN even to park outside this private area.

title: (7100) Estremoz - 46A Rossio Marquês de Pombal
description: At the moment there is a big construction site on a third of the square, maybe difficult

title: (7250) - Unnamed Road
description: If you like staying alone in the nature, by the river side, this is a great location. There is water around, public toilets but no shades which in high summer could be painful. There’s also a bar at the beach. The way from the village Montejuntos to the spot is on the narrow side but good enough for Campers up to 8/9 meters.

title: (06518) La Codosera - 16 Calle Molinos
description: Ideal picnic area to spend the night. 500m from the town. Bathing area in the river. Lots of shade and quiet.

title: (06192) Villar del Rey - 15 Calle Badajoz
description: Parking near a small gas station at the entrance to the village. Quiet without service

title: (7100-535) Estremoz - 14A Terreiro do Loureiro
description: Quiet parking for cars

title: (7100) Estremoz - 126 Rua Direita
description: Clay parking 3 or 4 flat spaces. Nice view. Unfortunately some waste. Access is via the drawbridge of the citadel. Therefore to be reserved for converted vans.

title: (06131) Alconchel - Unnamed Road
description: Next to the Castle, this plain is more suitable than the tiny and sloping parking lot above, paved until the end.

title: (06510) Alburquerque - EX-110
description: Lpg and water

title: (06518) La Codosera -
description: Small area to park right by the river, both sides are possible as you can cross the ford right there. Very quiet at night, an occasional dog bark. Very rural and surrounded by nature. Some locals passed by, all waved and said Hola!

title: (06131) Alconchel - Calle Venero
description: Service area - Parking next to the Miraflores castle, on the hillside of the town of Alconchel. Impressive views, very quiet place.

title: (06510) Alburquerque - Carretera del Pantano Peña Del Aguila
title_short: (06510) Alburquerque - Carretera del Pantano Peña Del Aguila
description: Picnic area with possibility of parking the van. 3 km from Villar del Rey. Very quiet and a hundred meters from the dam.

address.street: Carretera del Pantano Peña Del Aguila

title: (06192) Villar del Rey - Carretera del Pantano Peña Del Aguila
title_short: (06192) Villar del Rey - Carretera del Pantano Peña Del Aguila
description: Parking at the jetty of the reservoir. Anglers and some bathers. Hiking areas. Very quiet. The city is 5 minutes away.

address.street: Carretera del Pantano Peña Del Aguila

title: (06131) Alconchel - 5 Calle Dulce Chacon
description: Very quiet place, in the town of Alconchel, with all services. Many thanks to the people of Alconchel.

title: (06105) Cheles -
description: Quietly located flat P 2 km away Cheles village and EX-325, at bottom of road, 300m before very small leisure crafts harbor (= “embarcadero”) even at riverside of Alqueva big artificial lake, with stunning views. All painted parking spaces are 7,5m long. Gravel path bordering water. Restaurant of “embarcadero” opens full day 1-July till mid September; remaining, only lunches on weekends.

title: (06510) Alburquerque - 28 Calle Pozo Concejo
description: Parking next Machaco Hotel at the entrance of the village. There is little space, although there is not much room to park in the villa. In Duque Street, which is next, you can also park early. Although Google Maps appears with the ground, it is really asphalted.

title: (06187) Guadajira - 10A Calle Número 11
description: Quiet place to spend the night, without services, garbage cans nearby. Park for children, bar and food stores 2 minutes walk. Nice townspeople.

title: (06518) La Codosera - BA-053
description: Ample parking and abundant shade, with natural pool, snack bar and possibility of taking water

title: (7100) - N381
description: Near an old abandoned house, 50 m from the road (little traffic) between Estremoz and Redondo, 9 km south of Estremoz ... in an area where finding an open place is a challenge ... no services of course but the morning sun and tranquility to picnic or spend the night.

title: (06172) Torre de Miguel Sesmero - 2 Carretera Nogales
title_short: (06172) Torre de Miguel Sesmero - 2 Carretera Nogales
description: New place for 5 motorhomes.

title: (06510) Alburquerque - Unnamed Road
description: Very quiet spot right beside a lake

name: Area Camper Redondo
title: (7170) Area Camper Redondo
description: Free large area, quiet night. 500 m from the center. The park is a bit sloped but there are some areas that are level.

title: (06510) Alburquerque - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet place in the middle of nature to spend the day people fishing and spending the day in the field we spent two nights and very well.

title: (06510) Alburquerque -
description: Beautiful place on a piece of land between two estates. The dirt road to it is not so pretty, but I thought it was worth it. The area is used for recreation, by shepherds and unfortunately also by people to dump (large) waste. There is therefore some rubble here and there, despite the prohibition signs.

title: (7300) Alegrete - EM517-2
description: Lovely old village (castle) with 12 parking spaces (lot of them are not levelled). Stunning views of mountains and old village. There is a water tap yet we did not tried it. NOTE: it still lies in natural park (Parque Natural da Serra de São Mamede) where it is forbidden to overnight out of authorized places.

name: Parque de Autocaravanas de Santiago Maior
title: (7200) Parque de Autocaravanas de Santiago Maior
title_short: (7200) Parque de Autocaravanas de Santiago Maior
description: ASA paid camperstop. Pre-book online at outdoor-routes.pt .  16 marked pitches. Picnic tables and play area next door. On the edge of a quiet village with a small supermarket and cafés.

title: (7200) Barrada - Rua da Orada
description: Beautiful overnight stay on a reservoir. bumpy road. not flat.

title: (06160) Barcarrota - 10 Extramuros Diseminados
description:
Natural space next to the swamp of ahijon (Barcarrota).

a place surrounded by impressive nature.

title: (06380) Jerez de los Caballeros - Unnamed Road
title_short: (06380) Jerez de los Caballeros - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet place by the lake. We enter a Finca where access is public, passage between cows and we settled on the side of the road. Very quiet night

title: (7240) Mourão - CM 1127
description: A place with a lot of calm and tranquility ideal for spending the night and easily accessible, there is a post with a USB socket and picnic tables, a few meters from the cromlech of Jerez

title: (7200-173) Monsaraz - Rua do Convento
description:
This is a private farm space, surrounded by old stone walls, where the owner allows night stays in nature for travelers by motorhome, campervan or tent. 
You can choose your spacious pitch yourself in the shadow of the stone oaks and olive trees or in the sun. Wake up listening to the bird songs and the sounds of the Campo Alentejano!

 Watch our farm animals , which partly walk free.

Please call before arrival preferably via whatsup or email so that we can agree a time.

The service station for grey and black water is just 1 km away and also provides public toilets.

Check-in: 11h30-12h30 or 15h30-18h30 **
Check-out: 8h00-11h30

** Latest until 22h30 if pre-paid!

title: (7200) Telheiro - 18 Rua da Fonte
description: Complete service area. Need to call in advance to pick up key. (Phone visible for park4night PRO users only)

title: (7300-126) Portalegre - 13 Rua Mestre João Serra
description: Repsol, fills up German gas bottles, suitable adapter available!

title: (7300) Portalegre - N246
description: We have slept in the parking lot of the stadium without problem. Road next to it but little traffic at night. Open stadium restroom.

title: (7200) Monsaraz - CM1127
description: To fill up with water

title: (7200) Monsaraz - 3 Rua de São Bento
description: Monsaraz It is the parking lot of a hermitage demolished, just at the end of the village, above all. Follow the signs for hermitage of Sao Bento. It is much more discreet and beautiful than those below, as you have to cross the foot through narrow streets abstain very large motorhomes. You sleep in the viewpoint and you see a beautiful panoramic view of Mosaraz. Behind the Church the site is quieter.

title: (7240) Mourão -
description: This is the observatory parking lot. However, the door is open and you can comfortably spend the night here. A visit to the observatory is worthwhile, to see the wonders of the universe.

title: () - CM1127
description: Next to the old church of Santa Catarina da Monsaraz at the foot of the city; place under the olive trees with breathtaking view of Monsaraz.

title: (7300-126) Portalegre - 16 Rua do Joinal
description: Quiet area, in a street where there are some houses and several places to park. Pretty flat.

title: (7200) - Monsaraz river beach
description: Beautiful place under a cork oak in the shade near nature swimming 50m or arranged 300m easily accessible quiet unlike the parking nearby

title: (7300-126) Portalegre - 16 Rua do Joinal
description: Tired of the noise of cities, we were looking for a place to rest quietly without noise. We walked a bit into the commercial area of Portalegre and found this residential area with lots of parking and quite flat. Highly recommended and safe to rest one night.

title: (7300-126) Bairro dos Assentos - 4 Rua Luís Pathé
title_short: (7300-126) Bairro dos Assentos - 4 Rua Luís Pathé
description: Perfect place to do laundry, good price as well. Parking just outside

title: (7240) Mourão -
description: Next to the Monsaraz river beach. Public facilities 300 meters away with water and public shower. Garbage containers and Restaurant open during the day. Around several more areas to choose from. You can easily get there by car or motorhome if it doesn't rain a lot.

title: (7200) - Unnamed Road
description: Calm night at the foot of the dolmens in an old olive grove. seen on monsaraz

name: Camping Aguas Claras
title: (10515) Camping Aguas Claras
description: Camping Aguas Claras camping in the middle of nature. Incredible place from where to start to do countless routes. The campsite is very basic with very basic maintenance too, at least in the low season, which is when we were there. Very friendly staff. From there we did the route of the dolmens, highly recommended.

title: (7300-126) Portalegre - 4 N246
description: Self service launderette with change machine

title: (7240) Mourão -
description: Among the many marked parking lots, I recommend this open space that offers an enchanting view over the valley with the castle behind it. No service, except the waste bins in the street parking. For one night it is definitely worth it!

title: () Monsaraz - Praia fluvial
description:
NOT allowed overnight.
Public free P with fantastic view by the lake. Very nice with restaurant, boat rides  and kids playground 100 m away.

name: Parque De Pernoita De Autocaravanas
title: (7200-175) Parque De Pernoita De Autocaravanas
description: Free reasonable flat P dedicated to motorhomes, campers and caravans (according signal) between trees. Service area is in Telheiro village (follow road to N). The floor is a bit uneven, pebbles that will hardly be able to make you stay level, even with wedges. Wonderful panorama to E (nice sun rising) over Alqueva dam/lake and landscape. Walking access to historic medieval village. Note: just in front there is a free open space that extends over the breathtaking natural landscape, be careful if it rains to avoid getting bogged down.

title: (7300-126) Portalegre - E802
description: Free parking at Burger King restaurant. Next to the Leclerc supermarket. With gas station. Far in front of the center but near the main road. Inaccessible in motorhome.

title: (06500) San Vicente de Alcántara - 2003 Camino de la Vega
title_short: (06500) San Vicente de Alcántara - 2003 Camino de la Vega
description: Large area with very quiet picnic areas. You can stay overnight

title: (7200-175) Monsaraz - Rua das Videiras
description: Possible parking for the night, interesting to visit the fortified city No services, water Fountain inside the castle No Supermarket nearby Wonderfull for walking.

title: (7300-126) Portalegre - N246
description: Outdoor washing machine near the service station in the E.Leclerc car park. Two washing machines and a dryer. The bathroom in the hyper market was clean and well equipped.

title: (7300-126) Serra de São Mamede -
description: Ermida Sao Mamede! Dilapidated church. Flat places great views.

title: (06110) Villanueva del Fresno -
description: On an old bridge in nature! Have stood here overnight. Only one farmer happened to his farm. Beautiful old bridge! Top!

title: (7300-126) Serra de São Mamede -
description: Wonderful views from a parking spot next to the highest peak of the São Mamede mountain (1 025 m).

title: (10514) Valencia de Alcántara - CC-154
description: Spacious place, parking for cars nearby, picnic area, the border between Portugal and Valencia de Alcantara (11 km). It is made of light. Playground. Ideal for visiting the dolmens

title: (06500) San Vicente de Alcántara - 5 Lugar Canchos Blancos
title_short: (06500) San Vicente de Alcántara - 5 Lugar Canchos Blancos
description: Ideal for one night. The calm next to the hermitage is accessible by the slope but no problem for motorhomes.

title: (06500) San Vicente de Alcántara - Camino de Las Charcas
title_short: (06500) San Vicente de Alcántara - Camino de Las Charcas
description: The ponds quiet areas and drinking water wide and flat area

title: (06110) Villanueva del Fresno - 6 Travesía Huertas
description: Sports area with 7 poles with electricity and water outlets (it seems that there are 3 operational). the road passes nearby but it does not become annoying. there were about 8 vehicles parked. the space is large and many vehicles fit.

title: (06110) Villanueva del Fresno - 9 Avenida Portugal
description: An easily accessible place next to the Portugal highway, video surveillance and close to the Civil Guard Barracks, it has trees and enough space for the car, there is a public fountain 50 meters away and a huge park with children's games. Just a problem that many cars pass after 7 in the morning.

title: (06110) Villanueva del Fresno - 87 Calle San Juanito
title_short: (06110) Villanueva del Fresno - 87 Calle San Juanito
description: The town hall has a site to empty the gray water, some more services are missing but it is a good place if we are in trouble.

title: (10519) Lanchuelas -
description: Beautiful spot in nature with great view on the little lake. Very quiet. Shade available, good surface, flat. Nice walks. Good acces, we were with 7,50 camper. Clean, please keep clean and enjoy nature.
